pkgmetadata.longdescription: Adaptive Shrinkage of Correlation Vectors and Matrices // Performs adaptive shrinkage of correlation and covariance matrices using a mixture model prior over the Fisher z-transformation of the correlations, Stephens (2016) doi:10.1093/biostatistics/kxw041 with the method flexible in choosing a separate shrinkage intensity for each cell of the correlation or covariance matrices: it is particularly efficient in handling missing data in the data matrix.
